content: Hey @BatmanAoD (Kyle Strand) -- I realize I kind of don't remember the status of things here. I think we had a meeting and discussed it, though?
Maybe drop a few lines in #t-lang > 2021-10-06 planning meeting
Sorry, yes, I'll try to put something in there tomorrow. We did have a meeting, and you wrote up a hackmd: https://hackmd.io/6VtamfowQTK-63t3x1Uj4A
@nikomatsakis Sorry, didn't realize the planning meeting was today. Based on the notes, it looks like FFI-unwind wasn't mentioned?
No, we were pretty full up regardless!

@nikomatsakis I still have the biweekly update meeting on the calendar, but I haven't been pinging the group for a few check-ins now; as far as I know, there isn't anyone actively working on those soundness issues now. One thing I do think we need is someone with some Windows unwinding expertise; it looks like the last person pinged in the "catching all unwinding in windows" thread didn't actually respond.
@nikomatsakis ping -- not sure about meeting today
